reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is very knowledgeable and explains concepts clearly. The lectures are engaging, but the exams are a bit tough.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Professor Miller knows his stuff, but his lectures can be dry. You’ll need to do a lot of self-study.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Amazing professor! Her passion for chemistry is contagious, and she really cares about her students.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are long and tedious. He is knowledgeable but lacks the ability to engage the class.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Literature
reviews.review: Professor Davis is very approachable and encourages class discussions. The readings are heavy, but she makes them interesting.

reviews.subject: Physics I
reviews.review: Dr. Brown explains concepts well, but his grading is harsh. Make sure to attend the recitations.

reviews.subject: Sociology 101
reviews.review: Professor Lee is fantastic! Her classes are interactive and she relates the material to real-world issues.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is a great lecturer with real-world experience. The course is challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: English Composition
reviews.review: Professor Taylor is okay. She is a tough grader, but she gives good feedback on essays.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. White is very knowledgeable and provides interesting perspectives. The class is reading-intensive.

reviews.subject: Statistics 101
reviews.review: Professor Harris struggles to explain the material clearly. The class is difficult if you’re not already good at math.

reviews.subject: Biology II
reviews.review: Dr. Walker makes biology fascinating! His lectures are engaging, and he is always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Professor Martin is thought-provoking but can be hard to follow at times. Be prepared for deep discussions.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. King is passionate about the environment and inspires his students. The coursework is manageable.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Professor Hall is knowledgeable and her lectures are visually stimulating. Be prepared for a lot of memorization.

reviews.subject: Computer Science I
reviews.review: Dr. Allen is excellent! He makes complex topics understandable and is always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Professor Young encourages creativity but is a tough critic. Be ready for constructive criticism.

reviews.subject: International Relations
reviews.review: Dr. Scott has a deep understanding of global issues. His class is challenging but very informative.

reviews.subject: Marketing 101
reviews.review: Professor Adams has a lot of industry experience, but her lectures are disorganized. The course content is interesting, though.

reviews.subject: Advanced Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Green is a genius! His passion for math is evident, and he explains difficult concepts with ease.
